short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatic declining of GDPR cookie consent popups

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A super easy to use and efficient GDPR Cookie Consent Decliner.

Usage: The ON-/OFF Button when you click the Extension-Icon is for Enabling/Disabling the declining of GDPR cookies on the current homepage.  
This only disables the Auto-Decliner on the homepage you are while clicking the button.
